title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or Docker call.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embedder in chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that plugs into any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and embedding with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI that can be pointed at an Ollama backend instead of bundled models.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to prompt Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples: CPU, NVIDIA, AMD ROCm and multi-model setups.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter that autoconfigures Ollama4j client for injection into services.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Scripts to create custom GGUF models from Mistral fine-tunes and serve them via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with simple chat and embedding methods.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.
